title: cintai arinda
sahitya:
cintai arinda pinnum unranuk-kenpAl inda maunam jnyAyamA rAmA


anupallavi

  nandA viLakkena oLirndiDum unranai nALum aham koNDu nalvazhi naDakkum en


caraNam    tiruvaSTAkSara poruLE (uyar) unnai urugi azhaittADum vINAgumA
 tiruvaruLallAl matrOr mOhamA enakkup-pariyat-taruNam pArttal unakkut-tagumA
